title: Cyclist Magazine Podcast Episode 40 - Magnus Backstedt on Paris-Roubaix!
content:
Cyclist magazine
30 Sep 2021

To celebrate Roubaix, we sit down with legend of the race Magnus Backstedt to get all the good stories

Paris-Roubaix is back! After 900 days, the best race in the cycling calendar is back, get in!Â So to celebrate the Hell of the North's return and the inaugural women's Roubaix (what took them so long?), we decided to chat to bona fide legend of the race, winner from 2004, Magnus Backstedt on the latest episode of th Cyclist Magazine Podcast.

This is a man that lived, breathed and even ate the stones of Roubaix and he has some incredible stories to tell about his favourite race ever. So sit back and enjoy!

For more on Paris-Roubaix, see our hub page here.

To listen on Apple Podcasts, just click here.

If you liked this episode, please remember to leave us a review, comment and make sure to share with your cycling friends!
